page.title: SpringSaLaD Species
page.introduction: A SpringSaLaD species inherits the attributs of a Rule-based species, but has extra attributes describing its sites' physical attributes and relationship with nearby sites.
page.appearance:
When using SpringSaLaD Applications, it is important to be aware that:
A very strict geometry is required
Using a SpringSaLaD application has the following limitations:
The reaction rules are strictly categorized and must obey several syntax restrictions.
